product.description: With a plush SR Suntour fork featuring lockout, powerful Tektro hydraulic disc brakes, and double-walled 29-inch alloy wheels, the Hardrock Sport Disc is prepared for mountain trails and urban jungles.

bullets.bullet: Fully butted A1 Premium Aluminium 29er frame with ORE downtube for a lighter, more compliant and durable bike
80mm-travel SR Suntour fork with preload adjustment and size-specific spring rates means the suspension is dialled for your size. The included lockout allows for the most efficient climbing
Specialized Fast Trak Sport tyres use Adaptive Tread Technology for lower rolling resistance, but have plenty of grip for confidence on the trail
SR Suntour XCT crankset with Shimano Acera rear derailleur and 8-speed Sunrace cassette offers a wide range of gear selections and reliable shifting
Tektro hydraulic disc brakes/levers with Light Wave rotors create increased control and superior stopping power for more confident braking
Specialized Body Geometry Hardrock saddle has ample padding for comfort, and front/rear bumpers for durability
